poem:
Witness in Shadows

In the quiet shadows,  
a woman's brush moves,  
etching horror in hues unseen.  
Silence of an artist  
in the cacophony of desolation,  
each stroke a tender witness  
to unspeakable sorrow.  
Canvas bears truths,  
once cloaked in shadows,  
now lighting the hidden corridors  
of a darkened world.
